subject: Football (College)
Doping (Sports)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Will Grier, a freshman, violated the N.C.A.A.’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs. He started the last five games for the eighth-ranked Gators, who are 6-0.
snippet: Will Grier, a freshman, violated the N.C.A.A.’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs. He started the last five games for the eighth-ranked Gators, who are 6-0.
